articles.title: Pertamina Temukan Cadangan Hidrokarbon di Rokan
articles.author: Heri Purnomo
articles.summary: PT Pertamina Hulu Rokan (PHR) announced the discovery of hydrocarbon reserves in well MTH-001 at Desa Libo Jaya, Riau. The well confirmed hydrocarbons in the Menggala and Pematang URB formations. Early production rates are low, but the find signals potential for further development. Drilling began in September 2025, and production tests conducted between December 2025 and January 2026 validated the resource potential.

articles.title: Trump Pangkas Tarif Taiwan Jadi 15%, Minta Investasi Semikonduktor
articles.author: Anisa Indraini
articles.summary: The U.S. and Taiwan signed a trade agreement reducing Taiwan's semiconductor export tariffs from 20% to 15%. In exchange, Taiwan will invest $250 billion in U.S. semiconductor, energy, and AI production. The deal also sets 0% tariffs for generic drugs and aircraft components. This move aims to strengthen bilateral ties while potentially increasing tensions with China.

articles.title: Instalasi Pabrik Baterai Rampung, Indonesia Kian Dekat Industri EV
articles.author: Gezita Inova
articles.summary: BPI Danantara and MIND ID are developing an integrated EV battery ecosystem through PT Industri Baterai Indonesia. Partnering with CATL, they formed CATIB to build a battery cell facility in Karawang with an initial capacity of 6.9 GWh. Equipment installation was completed in January 2026, with operations expected by late 2026. This project strengthens Indonesia's domestic EV component production.

articles.title: Calon Pengantin Serbu Wedding Market Fair di Jakarta
articles.author: Mohammad Farrel
articles.summary: The Wedding Market Fair at Balai Kartini, Jakarta, featured over 250 vendors including organizers, decorators, and caterers from 16-18 January 2026. The free event allowed couples to explore wedding concepts, try bridal outfits, and sample menus. It attracted many visitors looking for inspiration and promotions for their upcoming weddings.

articles.title: Rahasia Bikin Pencatatan Usaha Lebih Tertata ada di Workshop Online Ini!
articles.author: Pradita Salsabila
articles.summary: An online workshop titled 'Mahir Olah Data dengan Spreadsheet Online untuk UMKM' teaches small business owners to organize finances using Google Drive and Sheets. The session aims to improve financial control and reduce errors. Scheduled for 20 January 2026, the workshop provides practical tools for managing income, expenses, and stock.

articles.title: Menteri PU Minta Anggaran Pemulihan Bencana Ditambah Jadi Rp 74 T
articles.author: Heri Purnomo
articles.summary: Public Works Minister Dody Hanggodo proposed increasing the disaster recovery budget from Rp 51 trillion to Rp 74 trillion. The additional funds are needed to build sabo dams, particularly in Gayo Lues, Aceh, to enhance disaster mitigation. The plan awaits administrative review before submission to the Ministry of Finance.

articles.title: Digusur! 39 Lapak Besi Tua & 18 Lapo Tuak Ilegal di IKN Rata dengan Tanah
articles.author: Anisa Indraini
articles.summary: OIKN demolished 39 illegal scrap metal yards and 18 'lapo tuak' stalls in the IKN region to maintain public order and prevent construction material theft. The action followed warnings issued on 8 January 2026. Authorities stated the businesses violated zoning and licensing regulations in the new capital area.

articles.title: Menteri PU Sebut Prabowo Setuju Pembangunan Tol Lembah Anai
articles.author: Heri Purnomo
articles.summary: President Prabowo approved the construction of the Lembah Anai toll road as a long-term solution to landslides and floods in West Sumatra. The project will include a permanent tunnel and is estimated to take one to two years. It will undergo feasibility studies and environmental assessments before construction begins.

articles.title: Wow! Tol Terpeka Disiapkan Jadi Landasan Darurat Pesawat
articles.author: Anisa Indraini
articles.summary: PT Hutama Karya is preparing a section of the Terpeka toll road (KM 228+300 to KM 231+200) to serve as an emergency aircraft runway. The preparation work is scheduled from 14-31 January 2026. Traffic management will be implemented to ensure safety while limiting disruption for regular road users.

articles.title: Imigrasi Perkuat Pengawasan di Kawasan Industri Weda Bay
articles.author: Anisa Indraini
articles.summary: Deputy Minister Silmy Karim visited the Weda Bay Industrial Park (IWIP) to strengthen immigration oversight and services. IWIP is a major nickel-based industrial hub in North Maluku with significant investment. The visit focused on ensuring orderly workforce mobility and supporting the strategic interests of the industrial zone.

articles.title: Pembangunan Hunian Dikebut Agar Warga Aceh-Sumut Tak Lagi Tinggal di Tenda
articles.author: Heri Purnomo
articles.summary: The Ministry of Public Works is speeding up the construction of 1,209 temporary houses in Aceh and North Sumatra for flood victims. The goal is to finish the units before Ramadan to move residents out of tents. Facilities will include communal kitchens, sanitation, and prayer spaces.

articles.title: 22 Ribu Penumpang Diprediksi Naik Whoosh Saat Libur Panjang
articles.author: Anisa Indraini
articles.summary: Passenger numbers for the Whoosh high-speed rail surged during the Isra Miraj long weekend, with 15,000 tickets sold by Friday. KCIC expects total passengers to exceed 22,000. Promotional fares, with discounts up to 43%, contributed to the high demand and occupancy rates of approximately 70% per train.

articles.title: Menteri PU Klaim Tidak Ada Lagi Daerah Terisolasi Usai Bencana Sumatera
articles.author: Heri Purnomo
articles.summary: Minister Dody Hanggodo reported that all areas isolated by floods and landslides in Sumatra are now accessible via land. All affected national roads and bridges are functional. While most regional roads have also been restored, some regional bridges still require further work to reach full functionality.

articles.title: Perusahaan Pelayaran Kembali Lewati Laut Merah dan Terusan Suez
articles.author: Heri Purnomo
articles.summary: Maersk will resume voyages through the Red Sea and Suez Canal after nearly two years of disruption. The MECL service will be the first to return on 26 January from Oman. This decision is expected to reduce transit times and logistics costs as conditions in the region have stabilized.

articles.title: Musisi Jalanan Malioboro Kini Bisa Terima Apresiasi via QRIS GoPay
articles.author: Heri Purnomo
articles.summary: Yogyakarta city and GoPay have digitalized street musicians in Malioboro using QRIS. This allows musicians to receive cashless tips and access financial services. The initiative aims to improve financial inclusion for creative workers and strengthen the cultural ecosystem while adapting to the growing trend of digital payments.

articles.title: Harga Minyak Dunia Tiba-tiba Anjlok, Ada Apa?
articles.author: Anisa Indraini
articles.summary: Global oil prices dropped over 4% after U.S. President Donald Trump indicated easing tensions in Iran. Brent crude fell to $63.76 and WTI to $59.19. The market responded to news that executions in Iran had reportedly stopped, reducing fears of geopolitical escalation despite newly announced U.S. sanctions.

articles.title: Wamendag Dorong Perluasan Perjanjian Dagang RI-Pakistan, Ini yang Dibidik
articles.author: Heri Purnomo
articles.summary: Deputy Trade Minister Dyah Roro Esti discussed upgrading the Indonesia-Pakistan trade agreement to a CEPA by 2027. The move aims to expand investment and trade certainty, particularly in sectors like edible oil and food security. Both countries are committed to building on recent diplomatic visits to enhance economic cooperation.

articles.title: Trump Simpan Hasil Penjualan Minyak Venezuela di Bank Qatar, Kenapa?
articles.author: Anisa Indraini
articles.summary: The U.S. transferred $500 million from seized Venezuelan oil sales to banks in Qatar. These funds are intended for priority sectors in Venezuela like food and medicine. While officials state the central bank of Venezuela will manage the funds under U.S. conditions, critics raise legal concerns about the routing process.

articles.title: Bandara Jember Mulai Layani Pengisian Avtur, Siap Terima Penerbangan Reguler
articles.author: Fadhly Fauzi Rachman
articles.summary: Notohadinegoro Airport in Jember began offering refueling services for aircraft, marking a step toward regular flights to Jakarta and Bali. The new infrastructure is expected to boost regional connectivity, tourism, and investment. Pertamina Patra Niaga emphasized that the service supports the airport's operational readiness and local economic growth.

articles.title: DJP Bisa Sita-Jual Saham Penunggak Pajak, Ini Alasan & Caranya
articles.author: Anisa Indraini
articles.summary: Indonesia's tax office (DJP) can now seize and sell shares from taxpayers who default on their payments, based on new regulations. The process involves blocking securities accounts, followed by seizure and eventual sale via the stock exchange. Proceeds are used to settle tax debts, with any remaining balance returned to the taxpayer.
